title: Thoughts, Feelings and the Brain with Dr Patrick Lockwood
description:
Patrick and I cover the latest theory on feelings and thoughts within the brain, along with the traditional gender roles that come along with both these concepts. Always enjoy chatting with Patrick, he makes the difficult concepts easy to understand!

Watch the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Thoughts--Feelings-and-the-Brain-with-Dr-Patrick-Lockwood-ef34b6

Patrick's YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_5lsyaHFA3PF069ZrFva0wArticles 

Articles referenced during our conversation:
https://academic.oup.com/scan/article/12/1/1/2823712
https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S1053811912005678

Follow Patrick on Twitter here: @PsychPLockwood
Follow me on Twitter: @AndreaLynnLewis
